DOC.HEADLINE: ORANGE COUNTY IN BANKRUPTCY ; PLANNING ON STAYING_PUT
DOC.TEXT: Only one county resident in four thinks the effects of the fund crisis will last far into the future , and the overwhelming majority have given no thought to leaving . Has the Orange County bankruptcy made you think_about moving_out of Orange County ? 04 # 25 , 07 # 10 , 11 Child in No school Total school children Yes , very seriously 7 % 10 % 5 % Yes , somewhat seriously 10 % 12 % 9 % No 83 % 78 % 86 % * * * * Thinking_about the future , five years from now , do you think that Orange County will be a better place or a worse place to live than it was before the Orange County bankruptcy , or will there be no difference ? 05 # 15 , 07 # 07 , 07 # 14 Total 18-34 35-54 55 and older Better place 29 % 24 % 27 % 42 % Worse place 24 % 30 % 23 % 18 % No difference 42 % 43 % 44 % 36 % Don ' t know 5 % 3 % 6 % 4 % Source : Times Orange County Poll
